brand.name: AM ROBOTS
brand.description: International manufacturer and distributor with headquarters in Denmark that designs, produces and sells innovative solutions for all aspects of the robotic lawnmower industry.

target_customers: Distributors in the robotic lawnmower market
value_proposition: High-quality and innovative products for all aspects of the robotic lawnmower industry
Cost-effective solutions developed in close cooperation with customers
Strong service and dedicated account management for dealers
positioning.vision: To be the preferred supplier for professionals in the international Robot Mower market.
positioning.mission: To make and develop products of high quality and functionality that are cost-effective and highly innovative, in close cooperation with customers.
values: Continuous improvement based on customer feedback

catalogue.description: Annually updated catalogue with the full product assortment for dealers and distributors.
catalogue.access: Downloadable from the website after signup/within dealer area.

conditions: Visa or Mastercard accepted if credit line cannot be extended.

price_policy.price_match_details: Will match competing offers and can go up to 10% below current price on quality products for dealers.

personal_manager.description: Each dealer has a personal account manager familiar with their market.
personal_manager.response_time: Within 2 hours on all working days for calls or emails.

faq_like_knowledge.who_is_am_robots: AM ROBOTS is a Danish manufacturer and distributor that supplies equipment and accessories for professional robotic lawnmower dealers internationally.
faq_like_knowledge.what_do_they_sell: They sell boundary wire, trackers, garages, connectors, blades, cable machines and related accessories for robot mower installations.
faq_like_knowledge.how_to_become_retailer: Dealers can sign up via the 'Become a retailer' flow on the website to see prices and access dealer benefits.
faq_like_knowledge.what_are_key_benefits_for_dealers: Free shipping above 1,500 EUR in specified regions, 14 days credit (subject to approval), personal account manager, and a price guarantee with possible discounts up to 10% below competing offers.
